name: Cow Rescue (ansa, Opuffer, Fylthy Cazual)
description:
MISSION BRIEFING: The cows of Planet Earth are enslaved, mistreated and forced to serve as livestock to their human oppressors. As a cow-loving alien, you will not let this stand. 'Teleport' cows to freedom with your spaceship, avoid dangerous obstacles, and upgrade your ship. How many cows can you save?

Local leaderboard will only work if you download the files.  If you wish to use the personal highscore feature, we recommend installing the files onto your computer.

Controls: Hold space to teleport cows, click for buttons (see more in the tutorial).

Credits: Jerry Li, Oliver Puffer, Ari & Ansa Schmulbach

Assets: All art assets made by Ari Schmulbach. Music by Jerry Li.
Font Credit: https://www.1001fonts.com/electrolize-font.html
